Message.MsgText: CWMMS0509W=CWMMS0509W: The operation to put the {0} node into maintenance mode breached the nodeMMTimeout timeout value of {1} minutes. The maintenance mode operation will continue despite this timeout.
Message.Explanation: The nodeMMTimeout property defines the time the client waits for a response from the maintenance mode operation. The maintenance mode operation will continue despite this timeout but return no further status to the client.
Message.UserResponse: Verify that the maintenance mode operation completed and modify the nodeMMTimeout value to reflect the requirements of the environment.

Message.MsgText: CWMMS0508E=CWMMS0508E: Unable to read maintenance mode configuration for server {0} on node {1}. The specified server is not defined or does not support maintenance mode.
Message.Explanation: The server.maintenancemode property was not found in the server configuration. Either the server name is incorrect, the server is incorrectly configured, or it does not support maintenance mode.
Message.UserResponse: Specify the name of a server that supports maintenance mode.
